ðŸ“– Summary: Windows-Use is a Python-based automation agent that allows AI agents to interact directly with the Windows GUI layer. It enables tasks like opening applications, clicking buttons, typing, and executing shell commands without relying on traditional computer vision models, making it suitable for LLMs to perform computer automation.
